chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
ds: soup
this: Ordered.sort [ordType of nid]
h: heap
cs: CStateT
lg: Log

Goal:
coh d -> this != cn -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd this h (dstate d); dsoup := ds |} cs lg

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
soup = union_map mid (msg TaggedMessage) : Type
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
CStateT = (nat * CState)%type : Set
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
nid = nat : Set
Notation heap := Heap.heap
Notation ordType := Ordered.type
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
Notation seq := list
cn_state = fun (d : dstatelet) (c : CStateT) (l : Log) => loc cn d = st :-> c \+ log :-> l : dstatelet -> CStateT -> Log -> Prop
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
cn_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), cn != n -> coh d -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} cs lg
pt_PhaseTwoRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : seq nat) (lg : seq (bool * seq nat)) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (this : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != this -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded {| dstate := upd this ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_InitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_Init d e lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e lg pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
pt_PhaseOneE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> loc n d = loc n {| dstate := upd m (loc m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
cn_PhaseOneReceive_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), cn_PhaseOneReceive d round next_data lg recvd -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := cn; active := true |} -> from \in pts -> from \in [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] -> coh d -> cn_PhaseOneReceive {| dstate := upd cn (mkLocal (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd, lg)) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} round next_data lg recvd
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d' e dt lg b pt
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> loc n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = loc n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
l3 : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), tpc_coh cn pts others d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes cn pts others
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> loc n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
localCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (n : nid) => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> seq nid -> nid -> Pred heap Arguments localCoh _ _%seq_scope
tpc_coh = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) => [/\ soupCoh cn pts (dsoup d), dom (dstate d) =i nodes cn pts others, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes cn pts others -> localCoh cn pts n (loc n d)] : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments tpc_coh _ (_ _)%seq_scope
Coherence.Mixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
CohPredMixin : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d)) -> (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d) -> Coherence.mixin_of nodes coh
cn_PhaseOneReceive = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) => let rps := [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] in [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) l, uniq rps, {subset rps <= pts}, forall (pt : nat_eqType) (b : bool_eqType), pt \in pts -> (pt, b) \in recvd -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt \notin rps -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq (nid * bool) -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneReceive _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> loc n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
nodes = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) => [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> seq nid Arguments nodes _ (_ _)%seq_scope
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
pt_not_cn : forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt != cn
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
soupCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> exists y : nat, cohMsg cn pts ms y)] : nid -> seq nid -> Pred soup Arguments soupCoh _ _%seq_scope
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (dynamic id)
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)

``` 
intros.
intros. intros. intros.
intros. unfold cn_state. simpl. unfold upd. unfold loc.
intros. 
simpl. unfold update. unfold loc. rewrite locE. rewrite locE'.
rewrite Hnin. auto.
